Balanna muslim comment tika. A atharin sama harak sinhala üêÉ innawa. Umbala eka deyak mathaka thiya ganilla muslim unta ona me rata saudiyak karanna. Ada sinhala ubala musammilta benapalla. Hebei thawa aurudu 10-15-25-30 k yaddi umbalath sunna karagena quranaya athata ganna thenata wetenawa . Ehema nounoth bella kepenawa. 
Baudda ratawal unu Pakisthan , Afganisthan , Bangaladesh , Indonesia  wage ratawal ada  muslimkaranaya wela thiyenne a kale a ratawala hitapu gon paragethi nayakayoi thakathiru kuhaka salli walata yata unu minissui nisa .
